definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="File" id="file">file</variable><variable type="JsonObject" id="object">object</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">AutoRegenQuests</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RitualsOfTheWildsConfig</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chernobog_first_give.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/Rituals_of_the_wilds/quests/eng</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Chernobog craves the essence of the void. Find the rare VoidOpal, forged in darkness, and bring it to me.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Quest After Finishing Text</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block
